text: 16.14: 2 Te 2.9; 1 T 4.1; Ze 3.15; VB 16.7; 17.14; 19.6; 19.15; 19.19-20Mba ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi guarira, nta mbarkɨrga mirikori ga mbuav, za kha ŋgui bakɨvir za kha nuianan mba ŋgui vhɨrve gari gumgir panin haa ruav, mbe mbui. Mbe mben muuŋrim, mbe wari won ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi fukfugɨp, mbe bevahɨrga, mbe ntara khavɨrga. Mbe za kha ŋkasŋkagi ki Fhe Bakɨme, za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi gangiap, mbe suanga tuga bakɨmen, mbe ana phorgɨ shogɨrga.
